title: Stealing Magic: A Sixty-Eight Rooms Adventure
description:
Sixth graders Ruthie and Jack thought their adventures in the Thorne Rooms were over, until miniatures from the rooms start to disappear. Is it the work of the art thief who’s on the loose in Chicago? Or has someone else discovered the secret of the Thorne Rooms’ magic?

Paperback. 272 pages.

Middle Grade (8-12).
